paper_abstract: The Randic index R(G) of a graph G is the sum of the weights (d(u)d(v))(-1/2) of all edges uv of G, where d(u) denotes the degree of the vertex u. In this paper, we give sharp lower bounds of, Randic index of unicyclic graphs with girth g which partly confirms a conjecture by Aouchiche, Hansen and Zheng.
paper_title: On the Randic index of unicyclic graphs with girth g
